stories.text:
Hello everyone,

I’m helping a university in Barcelona which is looking to place 37 Ukrainian students in internships.

We are going to provide SDR and growth marketing training through a partner, but I am looking for companies in need of SDRs and growth marketers.

These students will be trained and ready to contribute from day 1.

Ideally, this is a 6-month, paid internship which could lead to a full-time position. We will handle the admin stuff to ease international hiring.

If you or someone you know could be interested, please DM, send me an email at pablo@inteliom.app or connect with me on LinkedIn (www.linkedin.com/in/pablomacias).

Looking forward to hearing from you!

stories.text:
I am looking for pointers here. I am an engineering manager. Many of us have periodic syncs with out skip level managers, just 1-1. What do you usually do in these syncs? I am struggling to find themes, topics for these.

Obviously I can ask questions about work, but we are already in a lot of meetings with other members that cover most or all of the work stuff. I ask questions about what we are going to do in the long term and ask about resource planning and hiring, but these are usually non-repeating because I cannot ask the same question every month. This person is really good and is great at their job and so I would love to have a meaningful conversation with them and learn, however I am not sure what to ask and how to "learn". I would love to hear your experience with this and any pointers, themes etc.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you frame the conservation with skip level managers?
